intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Whew...this passage just keeps on going, doesn't it? I'm beginning to worry that we made a wrong turn somewhere...

intro.speaker: Azura
intro.line: Believe it or not, I actually remember this part of the tunnel. So I think we're getting close.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: That's reassuring. Thank you, Azura. Although...this looks an awful lot like a dead end.

intro.speaker: Azura
intro.line: No, look. There are stairs on one side. You just can't see them from this angle. The exit must be at the top.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: So. The heart of Nohrian power is just above us. Perhaps a few of us should take a quick look. It might be reckless for all of us to burst into the palace at once...

intro.speaker: Azura
intro.line: Good idea. We're with you, Corrin.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Here goes nothing...

intro.speaker: Nohrian
intro.line: Hyaaah!

intro.speaker: Nohrian
intro.line: Yah! Hyah!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: This isn't the throne room... Where are we?

intro.speaker: Ryoma
intro.line: It looks like a training facility. These soldiers are being put through their paces.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Well, at least we're in the castle.

intro.speaker: Ryoma
intro.line: Yes. But of all the places the tunnel could have led... We're surrounded by Nohr's most elite soldiers!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Gods! Maybe they haven't noticed us yet. We should keep quiet...

intro.speaker: Ryoma
intro.line: Look, someone's coming!

intro.speaker: Hans
intro.line: What are you idiots doing? This is a FULL CONTACT exercise! I want to see real blood! Get after it!

intro.speaker: Nohrian
intro.line: Yes, sir!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: That's Hans! It seems like Garon must have given him a promotion...

intro.speaker: Ryoma
intro.line: Yes. If I had to guess, he's in charge of this entire group.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: I'm not a vengeful person...but he killed Gunter right in front of me. I'd sure like to avenge his death.

intro.speaker: Nohrian
intro.line: Well, well! What do we have here? Captain Hans! Some intruders are hiding behind the statue!

intro.speaker: Hans
intro.line: Great! Drag 'em out here—we'll use 'em for target practice. Wait...that's Corrin!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Hello, Hans.

intro.speaker: Hans
intro.line: How the hell did you get in here?

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: I have nothing to say to a coward like you. I'd rather let Noble Yato do the talking.

intro.speaker: Hans
intro.line: Bahaha! You'd threaten me in front of my own battalion? Oh, I'm going to enjoy this. Rip 'em apart, soldiers!

intro.speaker: Nohrian
intro.line: Haaaah!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Hah!

intro.speaker: Nohrian
intro.line: Ugh...no...

intro.speaker: Nohrian
intro.line: Taste my steel!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Hyaaah!

intro.speaker: Nohrian
intro.line: Oof...

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Are all your soldiers this poorly trained, Hans? What will Garon think?

intro.speaker: Hans
intro.line: Damn it... Don't be afraid of this pathetic child, soldiers! She's all talk! Sacrifice yourselves if need be. For King Garon's glory!

intro.speaker: Nohrian
intro.line: But, Captain...

intro.speaker: Hans
intro.line: What was that? Please, speak up, and I'll relay your comments to King Garon! I'm sure he'll be sympathetic to you and your family. Now SHUT UP and KILL THE INTRUDERS!

intro.speaker: Nohrian
intro.line: Urk!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: *huff* *huff*

intro.speaker: Hans
intro.line: Bwahaha! There's the pathetic crying baby I remember. Don't let up, soldiers! We've got him/her right where we want him/her.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: I'll show you who's pathetic.

intro.speaker: Hans
intro.line: Ooh, look who learned to talk like a real soldier! Well, you're not the only one who's gotten stronger. I'm King Garon's newest captain. Let me show you how I got my promotion. HAAAH!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: OH—

intro.speaker: Ryoma
intro.line: Corrin, look out!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Lilith! NO! Lilith! NO! Talk to me, Lilith! ARGHHH!

intro.speaker: Hans
intro.line: Stupid bird! I'd have had her... Never mind. I won't miss again. I'll have your head off with the next swing—count on it!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: You'll pay for this, Hans... I'll kill you with my own two hands!

boss.speaker: Hans
boss.line: Let me relieve you of your head! Bwahaha!

boss.speaker: Hans
boss.line: You...you killed me! How can this be? URGHH...

boss.speaker: Hans
boss.line: Ah, I finally get a chance to finish the job. My axe is waiting...

boss.speaker: Corrin
boss.line: I'm going to burn you to the ground, Hans. When I'm through with you, your axe will be the only reminder you ever lived.

end.speaker: Ryoma
end.line: Stand down, Nohrians! Your captain has been defeated! Drop your weapons, and your lives will be spared.

end.speaker: Nohrian
end.line: They killed Captain Hans... What do we do?

end.speaker: Nohrian
end.line: I...I don't know. I think we surrender.

end.speaker: Takumi
end.line: It looks like they're giving up.

end.speaker: Ryoma
end.line: Good. Then we're done here.

end.speaker: Hinoka
end.line: Guys, we've got a problem. Lilith took quite a shot...

end.speaker: Ryoma
end.line: Gods, no...

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: Lilith...please open your eyes. Hans is dead. We finally got him. Please... You have to be OK!

end.speaker: Sakura
end.line: She's too far gone for my rod to work. I don't think I can save her, Corrin...

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: What?! No!

end.speaker: Elise
end.line: My staff isn't helping either. What do we do?

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: This can't be happening...

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: Lilith! You're...you're human again!

end.speaker: Lilith
end.line: *cough* *cough* Only for a moment, it seems... The Astral Dragon Moro has taken pity on me. It's giving me the strength to return to this form for my last few breaths...

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: Please don't say that! You're not going to die. You can't! Please! Stay with us!

end.speaker: Lilith
end.line: I'm sorry, milord/milady, but I'm not long for this world. Please don't cry. I decided to give my life for you, and I'm happy I succeeded. After all, you already saved my life once. This just makes us even. I die with no regrets.

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: But...we could end the war today! You could live in a peaceful world... Don't give up!

end.speaker: Lilith
end.line: It's OK, Lord/Lady Corrin. I know how far we've come. And I know you will succeed. I can die happy, remembering our time together and the progress we've made. Lord/Lady Corrin...be brave and go on without me.

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: Lilith...no. No... WAAAAAH!

end.speaker: Elise
end.line: Lilith... This can't be happening...

end.speaker: Sakura
end.line: I'm so sorry...I couldn't s-save you...

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: What are we even fighting for? Is it worth it?

end.speaker: Ryoma
end.line: Look up, Corrin.

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: Ryoma?

end.speaker: Ryoma
end.line: Dry your tears. Think about Lilith's sacrifice. She gave her life so you could continue fighting. And what are we fighting for? We are fighting for peace! We are fighting for Queen Mikoto and for the whole world! Do you think Lilith would want you to give up like this?

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: Ughhh...

end.speaker: Ryoma
end.line: Listen. It is time for you to rise to the occasion. If we want to end this war, now is the time for us to take action!

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: I'm just so tired. Tired of loss. Tired of death.

end.speaker: Ryoma
end.line: There will be a time for rest. But that time is not now. Rise up! The sacred blade Yato chose YOU, Corrin. We're all counting on you!

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: ... You're right. I know you're right. I will not stop until King Garon's reign of terror is over. Let's go, everyone.

end.speaker: Ryoma
end.line: That's the spirit.

end.speaker: Elise
end.line: Father's room is this way, Corrin. Please promise you'll try talking first.

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: I will. ... Thank you, Lilith. And good-bye for now.
